put.description:
Update specific task of the authed user's institution. If task is not found it will be created.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].tasks-put-task` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

delete.description:
Update specific task of the authed user's institution.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].tasks-delete-task` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

put.description:
Enable task periodic generation.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].tasks-put-task-enable` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

Disable task periodic generation.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].tasks-put-task-disable` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

parameters.name: test_emails
parameters.description: Emails to send instead of task targets. Enables test mode if present.

parameters.name: period_start
parameters.description: Override period start. ISO format. Time is ignored.

parameters.name: period_end
parameters.description: Override period end. ISO format. Time is ignored.

post.description:
Trigger generation of report.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].tasks-post-task-run` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

put.description:
Shorthand to remove given email in given task.

Needs `general.tasks-put-task-unsubscribe` (see `/me/permissions` for more info) but it should always be granted.

get.description:
Get specific report.

Needs `general.reports-get-year-yearMonth-filename` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

List all possible queues names.

Needs `general.queues-get` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

put.description:
Pause the whole queue.

Needs `general.queues-put-queue-pause` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

Resume the whole queue.

Needs `general.queues-put-queue-resume` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

get.description:
Get jobs of the queue.

Needs `general.queues-get-queue-jobs` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].queues-get` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

post.description:
Retry specific job of the authed user's institution.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].queues-post-queue-jobs-jobId-retry` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

put.description:

post.description:
Force specific cron to run.

Needs `general.crons-post-cron-force` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

get.description:
Get history entries of all tasks of given institution.

Needs `namespaces[namespaceId].history-get` (see `/me/permissions` for more info).

Get authed user info.

Needs `auth-get` (see `/me/permissions` for more info) but it should be always granted.

Check permissions of current user. There are 2 types of permissions :

- `general` permissions that doesn't depend on the requested namespace
- `namespace`d permissions, that depend on the requested namespace

Needs the `namespaces[namespaceId].auth-get-permissions`, but it should be always granted.

List all accessible namespaces by user.

Needs the `namespaces[namespaceId].auth-get-namespaces` (see `/me/permissions` for more info), but it should be always granted.

lastId.description: Id of last item in response

get.description:
Get all available users.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

post.description:
Create new user.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

put.description:
Create, update or delete many users.

If you provide no `memberships`, it will keep current ones. If you provide empty `memberships`, it will remove all current memberships.

When creating a membership, **user and namespace must exist**, so you may want to create namespaces first (without `members`)

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

get.description:
Get specific user.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

put.description:
Update specific user if found, create if not.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

delete.description:
Delete specific user.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

post.description:
Create new membership for user.

This route and `PUT /admin/namespaces/{namespace}/members/{username}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

put.summary: Update or create membership of a user
put.description:
Update membership of a user if found, create it if not.

This route and `PUT /admin/namespaces/{namespace}/members/{username}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

delete.description:
Delete specific membership of a user.

This route and `DELETE /admin/namespaces/{namespace}/members/{username}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

get.description:
Get specific membership of a user.

This route and `GET /admin/namespaces/{namespace}/members/{username}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

lastId.description: Id of last item in response

get.description:
Get all available namespaces.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

post.description:
Create a new namespace.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

put.description:
Create, update or delete many namespaces.

If you provide no `members`, it will keep current ones. If you provide empty `members`, it will remove all current memberships.

When creating a membership, **user and namespace must exist**, so you may want to create users first (without `memberships`)

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

get.description:
Get specific namespace.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

put.description:
Update specific namespace, if not found create it.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

delete.description:
Delete specific namespace.

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

post.description:
Add membership to a user.

This route and `POST /admin/users/{username}/memberships` have the same effect

**The returned data is the whole namespace (with updated membership).**

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

put.summary: Update or create membership of a user
put.description:
Update membership to a user, if not found create it.

This route and `PUT /admin/users/{username}/memberships/{namespace}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

delete.description:
Remove membership to a user.

This route and `DELETE /admin/users/{username}/memberships/{namespace}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.

get.summary: Get speficic membership of a user
get.description:
Get membership of a user.

This route and `GET /admin/users/{username}/memberships/{namespace}` have the same effect

Only usable with the API Key provided at server initialization.
